author: user123
text: "Internet down again in Makati! #Globe #internetproblems"

author: JuanDelaCruz
text: "@Globe My connection in Quezon City has been unstable all morning.  Can't even load a webpage!"

author: MariaClara
text: "Anyone else having trouble with Globe in Pasig? Super slow internet!"

text: "Is Globe having an outage in Cebu? My internet is down."

author: ManilaResident
text: "Internet is crawling in Manila today. Thanks, Globe 🙄"

author: DavaoDude
text: "@Globe please fix the internet in Davao! It's been down for an hour!"

author: moviebuff
text: "Having trouble streaming in Taguig. Is Globe down?"

author: PasayUser
text: "@Globe internet is down in Pasay! Please advise."

author: frustrateduser
text: "Another day, another Globe outage in Makati. 😤"

text: "Internet is spotty in Quezon City.  @Globe what's going on?"

author: cebuana
text: "Can't get online in Cebu. Is it just me or is Globe down?"

author: DavaoGamer
text: "@Globe any updates on the outage in Davao?"

author: happycustomer
text: "Internet is back in Taguig! Thanks, Globe!"

author: PasayBusiness
text: "Still no internet in Pasay. @Globe this is getting ridiculous."

text: "Finally! Internet is working again in Makati. #Globe"

text: "Internet seems to be stable now in Quezon City.  @Globe"

text: "Anyone else experiencing slow internet in Cebu? #Globe"

text: "@Globe internet is down again in Davao! This is the third time this week!"

text: "Having trouble connecting to the internet in Taguig. @Globe please help!"

text: "Internet is out in Pasay. @Globe is there an estimated time of restoration?"
